ygData.subject: RE: RE: bah
ygData.msgSnippet: Yesterday when I wrote the message, my skill was 65.  Around 12 more lanterns last night maxed my skill at 68.  I switched to cams and 10 attempts produced 6
ygData.messageBody:
Yesterday when I wrote the message, my skill was 65. Around 12 more
lanterns last night maxed my skill at 68. I switched to cams and 10
attempts produced 6 cams and 2 pts of skill.

Kazaan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Aaron Bolch [mailto:aaronbolch@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 5:18 PM
> To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] RE: bah
>
>
> From: "Aaron Bolch" <aaronbolch@...>
>
> >From: Chuck Krauth <chuck.krauth@...>
> >
> >When I hit 16 I decided to try tinkering so I bought some gears and
> >sprockets to make lockpicks. I dropped about 60 plat and
> got nothing in
> >return. Anyway, I gave up on tinkering for a long time, but
> recently have
> >gotten back into it.
> >
> >At level 47 and with a 184 int, I have gotten increases from
> making the
> >lanterns about every 5 attempts. It may be my imagination,
> but even a
> >little extra int seems to help, so if you can get an int
> buff before going
> >to work, do it.
>
> You didn't mention what level your tinkering is at.. I have
> a 165 int
> currently, so there is not a lack of int involved for my attempts.
>
> >
> >Kazaan of Veeshan
>
